EmailTemplate.subject: Taking Charge of Change | Prework and Programme Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
We look forward to your participation in {!Training_Event}
Programme Dates: {!Training_Event__c.Start_Date__c} - {!Training_Event__c.End_Date__c} at {!Training_Event__c.Location__c}
Our goal is to equip you to understand the changes underway at your organization and support your ability to engage with the change process.
PREPARING FOR YOUR programme Prework Requirements
To maximize your in-programme learning experience, you will need to complete a number of prework tasks. You should allow 30 minutes to complete.
Set-up your Prosci Portal Access
You will receive an email from portal@prosci.com with instructions on how to finish setting up your Prosci Portal access. This is where you will find the resources and tools to support your in-programme learning.
Pre-Learning
Identify a change to focus on in the course, and:
Identify the reasons the change is needed Identify who will need to do their jobs differently for the change to succeed Think about where the change might encounter resistance
Watch -Tim Talks: Back to the Basics. Optional- We highly recommend viewing these additional videos to understand the 5 Tenets of Change Management
Tenet 1 - We change for a reason Tenet 2 – Organizational change requires individual change Tenet 3 – Organizational outcomes are the collective result of individual change Tenet 4 – Change Management is an enabling framework for managing the people side of change Tenet 5 – We apply change management to realize the benefits and desired outcomes of change
Schedule
The schedule below indicates the time you will be required to be attend.
Course Timings prompt start at local time zone: Europe/London
{!Training_Event__c.Program_Schedule__c}
Your Instructor will factor in breaks in around the flow of training each day.
What You Need for Success as an In-Person Learner
Your learning experience is very important to us. The following will greatly enhance your experience and success:
IT requirements - Laptop or desktop computer with Microsoft Office 2007 or newer. Mac users, please use Microsoft Office for Mac to ensure tool compatibility.
If you have any questions about preparing for your programme, please don’t hesitate to contact us at training.europe@prosci.com.
Best regards,
{!Training_Event__c.OwnerFullName}
Training Coordinator
